html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-10012024-09-09DND
ActCanadian Forces Superannuation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canadian Forces Superannuation Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADIAN FORCES SUPERANNUATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) fix language discrepancies between English and French versions; (2) enable common-law partners to access the Optional Survivor Benefit; (3) improve clarity and simplify administrative requirements.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2024-0175 Publication Date: 2024-09-25
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CANADIAN FORCES SUPERANNUATION REGULATIONS in order to (1) fix language discrepancies between English and French versions; (2) enable common-law partners to access the Optional Survivor Benefit; (3) improve clarity and simplify administrative requirements.
